statements: DELETE FROM CyberbullyingEvidence WHERE victim_name = 'Alice' AND bully_name = 'Bob';
DELETE FROM CyberbullyingEvidence WHERE incident_id = 1 AND victim_name = 'Alice';
DELETE FROM CyberbullyingUsers WHERE user_id = 101 AND role = 'admin';
DELETE FROM CyberbullyingIncidents WHERE incident_date < '2022-01-01' AND reported_by = 'Alice';
DELETE FROM ActionsTaken WHERE action_description LIKE '%removed%'
DELETE FROM Attachments WHERE evidence_id = 123 AND attachment_id = 456
DELETE FROM Comments WHERE commenter_name = 'John Doe'
